thread.title: Mark Kremer
thread.title_full: Saatva Mattress reviewed by Mark Kremer

author: Mark Kremer
title: Mark Kremer
text:
I don't know how much I can say to explain how pleased I am with the Saatva mattress. I wanted to wait a little before writing this to get a good idea of the product I'm reviewing. I've had the mattress for 6 months and haven't had a bad nights sleep. I used to sleep well about a night a week before purchasing this mattress.
Every time I walk in my bedroom I look at the bed and cannot wait to be able to get back in it. I've told friends about it, but none have gone out and tried to purchase one yet. Oh well, their loss. Customer service has been great, but if I had to complain about 1 thing it's that there is absolutely no flexibility as far as delivery.
